name: UpFirst
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: NPR’s Up First is the news you need to start your day. The biggest stories and ideas – from politics to pop culture – in ten minutes. Hosted by David Greene, Steve Inskeep and Rachel Martin, with reporting and analysis from NPR News. Available weekdays by 6am ET.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
